com.membase.jtap.ops
Class DumpStream

java.lang.Object
  com.membase.jtap.ops.DumpStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
TapStream
public class DumpStream
extends java.lang.Object
implements TapStream

DumpStream is a template class for starting a basic tap connection to a membase server. It takes a identifier string which is used to restart connections that are interrupted prematurely. Membase will dump all of the items in a given node and transmit the key name and value of each key-value pair.

          Creates a default dump stream.
